input.excerpt:
```100_dada.R
  # DADA2 quality filtering on read-pairs

  ##### filter_pairs_{.orient}_{.seqrun} #####
  # character: file names with path of filtered read files (fastq.gz)
  #
  # additional quality filtering on read-pairs
  tar_file_fast(
    filter_pairs,
<|editable_region_start|>
    dada2_meta |>
      dplyr::mutate(
        trim_R1 = purrr::keep(trim, endsWith, "_R1_trim.fastq.gz"),
        trim_R2 = purrr::keep(trim, endsWith, "_R<|user_cursor_is_here|>
      ) |>
      dplyr::group_by(
<|editable_region_end|>
        dplyr::pick(any_of(c("seqrun", filter_option_names)))
      ) |>
```

variables.name: dada2_meta
variables.value:
Columns:
* seqrun: chr
* orient: chr
* sample_key: chr
* filt_R1: chr
* filt_R2: chr
* trim_R1: chr
* trim_R2: chr
* maxEE_fwd: dbl
* maxEE_rev: dbl
* truncLen_fwd: int
* truncLen_rev: int
* filter_id: chr

output:

        trim_R2 = purrr::keep(trim, endsWith, "_R2_trim.fastq.gz")
      ) |>
      dplyr::group_by(
<|editable_region_end|>
